response.job_title: Project Manager | Project leader |  Improvement Consultant | Data Analyst | SAP | Microsoft Project | Scrum | Innovation
response.summary: I am an industrial engineer with advanced English level and extensive experience in the formulation and development of projects, data analysis in companies in the cosmetic sector, with knowledge in programming, management of tools such as SAP, Tableau and agile methodologies, I have the ability to learn fast, manage good interpersonal relationships, teamwork and orientation to the efficient achievement of goals. Interested in project leadership.
response.skills: Compras, Análisis de carga, Gestión del tiempo, Análisis de negocio, Metodologías ágiles, Desarrollo de innovación, Gestión de la innovación, Innovación en productos, Administración, Estrategia, Habilidades sociales, Planificación de proyectos, Planificación estratégica, Liderazgo, Informes y análisis, Resolución de problemas, Informes de indicadores clave de rendimiento, Capacidad de análisis, Tableau, Mejora de procesos

-Project Manager "Implementation of the Virtual Medical Center for the state of TN".
-Project Manager "Implementation of the Virtual Medical Center for the state of NJ".
profile_positions.title: Senior Improvement Consultant USA

profile_positions.description:
Functions:

-Make recommendations for definitions on innovation projects for your brand. Your final deliverable is a prototype approved by brand, with commitment to quality, cost, time and value expectations.

-Member of the cross-functional team in the process of research, strategy building, portfolio visioning, planning, conceptualization and design of innovation. Provides valuable analysis and recommendations for decision making. 

-Monitor and control the process deliverables in the stages of research, strategy, portfolio vision, planning, conceptualization and design of new products, ensuring compliance with the timing of the activities that make up the critical path.

-Develop and maintain project indicators, to perform analysis, compliance reports, budget, time to delivery, so that management can make decisions and ensure the achievement of strategic innovation objectives.

-Lead risk management by following up on action plans identified during the planning, conceptualization and design stages.

Achievements:

-Improved the Pass to Development tool and given the quality of the tool, it was implemented company-wide.

-Developed a workload projection model with 90% approximation to the workload reality, allowing to identify future workload peaks and thus be able to implement required strategies.

-Received recognition for effectiveness in the management of annual change controls.
profile_positions.title: Category Innovation Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Functions:

-Advise public and private sector companies in the design of projects.

-Create and implement strategies for continuous improvement, resource optimization and process improvement.

-Maintain updated all function, process and procedure manuals of clients to ensure their correct publication before the integrated management system.

Achievements:

-I was awarded bidding with the mayor's office of Monteria for the feasibility study for the expansion of the personnel plant, which included load studies, updating of functions and processes manual.

-I managed to have a portfolio of nine clients of public and private sector companies during the life of the company before the COVID-19 sanitary emergency.
profile_positions.title: Consultant - Cofounder

profile_positions.description:
-Define, control and manage the teaching, management and administrative staff, appropriate to the needs identified for the fulfillment of the objectives established by the institution.

-To perform the registration and entry of the novelties of the staff, in order to ensure the timely coverage of their needs.

-Execute the procedures established for the selection of teaching and administrative staff, in accordance with the regulations and policies in force.

-Maintain updated information related to the teaching staff, teaching and administrative staff, for decision making.

-To prepare reports, minutes, official documents and requirements, according to the immediate superior's dispositions, as well as to measure and analyze the process indicators, which allow to make the pertinent decisions for continuous improvement.

-Support compliance with the quality management system.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Functions:

-Develop the design and execution strategies of the projects developed by the foundation.

Ensure compliance with the work schedule and conduct periodic follow-up meetings. 

-Coordinate the administrative and human talent processes, ensuring the management of the purchase of supplies, stationery and other materials necessary for the proper functioning of the foundation, payment to suppliers.

-Make and present periodic administrative management reports to senior management.

Achievements:

-Implement the foundation's quality management system, legally shielding possible sanctions and fines for its non-implementation.

-Regulate the process of hiring temporary personnel for the management of specific projects, guaranteeing compliance with the minimum requirements established by the Ministry of Labor.

-Create a regularization plan in parafiscal contributions for the foundation's staff, achieving 100% of contributions.
profile_positions.title: General coordinator and project manager

profile_positions.description:
Functions:

-Perform management reports.

-Carry out the process of purchasing equipment and requesting maintenance services.

-Review documentation and verification of compliance with the requirements for participation in the purchasing process.

-Capture suppliers and perform the process of verification of quality standards of equipment, materials and supplies.

company.name: Keralty
company.description:
Formerly Organización Sanitas Internacional, Keralty is a multinational business group offering integrated health solutions across the health sector—providing both health care financing and health care delivery itself. Also includes educational and socially-focused organizations that complement our world of health mission.

Our approach to integrating practice, education and research has made us leaders in patient experience, clinical outcomes and innovation. We strive to deliver the best care to every member and patient, helping them get healthier and providing comprehensive care for the sick.

Focused on the health and well-being of our members, patients and communities, we continue to elevate the state of health care in the countries where we have presence through technological, social and organizational innovation while generating employment, wealth and quality of life.
